attributes.action: Remove Jack Straw As Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I request that Jack Straw be removed from the Ministry Of Justice and Lord Chancellor and Secretary of State for Justice.

He is trying to privatise all public sector services, eg Post Office, Prison Service and has plans to privatise the others, the Police etc

He is responsible for the loss of several thousand jobs in the public services

He puts money and profit over safety and security

It is time for him to go

reasons: Information which may be protected by an injunction or court order
